Company

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

Name Code Created Date Share Price
{{ compdata.companyname }} {{ compdata.code }} {{ compdata.createddate }} {{ compdata.shareprice }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-comp-fetch-data', templateUrl: './comp-fetch-data.component.html' }) export class CompFetchDataComponent { public compfetchdata: Company[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { console.log(baseUrl); http.get(baseUrl + 'weatherforecast/getcompany').subscribe(result => { console.log(result); this.compfetchdata = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Company { companyname: string; code: string; shareprice: number; createddate: Date; }
